sent.orig: Farmer indicated this was a useful method when baking in an oven was not practical.
sent.trans: Farmer声明这是在没有烤箱的情况下很有用的一种烹饪muffin的方法。

sent.orig: Investigate its reason, basically be these local everything let farmer foot bill, cause farmer load overweight.
sent.trans: 究其原因，主要是这些地方事事都让农民掏腰包，导致农民负担过重。

sent.orig: The farmer had hoped to ask another farmer for help.
sent.trans: 农夫本希望求助于一个农夫。

sent.orig: Third, Shaoshan farmer movement is Mao Zedong farmer revolutionary theory important viewpoint experimental farm.
sent.trans: 韶山农民运动是毛泽东农民革命思想重要观点的实验场。

sent.orig: Ask a farmer to share management even, let a farmer become the host of cooperation.
sent.trans: 还要请农民参与治理，让农民成为合作社的主人。
